text: Chaubees Ghante aka 24 Ghante is a 1958 Hindi film directed by Dwarka Ghosla. It stars Premnath, Shakeela, Nishi, K. N. Singh, Maruti, Shammi, Sheela Vaz, Kanchanmala. It had music by Bipin Babul and lyrics written by Raja Mehdi Ali Khan.List of Bollywood films of 1958 ==Plot== ==Cast== * Prem Nath * Shakila * K.N.
